Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery grooved vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with pale red-brown slip and remains of several lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394925) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394925)
